titles.title: Affordable Prescriptions for Patients Act of 2019
Affordable Prescriptions for Patients Act of 2019
Affordable Prescriptions for Patients Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to prohibit anticompetitive behaviors by drug product manufacturers, and for other purposes.
Affordable Prescriptions for Patients Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Graham with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 132.
